about_the_game:
About the Game

Low and Furious (LAF), which will be called Baixos de Quebrada (BDQ) exclusively in Brazil, is a vehicle driving game that allows you to customize the car of your dreams! Lower it, add window tints, change the wheels, install a booming sound system, and much more!

In addition to customization options, you can participate in street races to gain reputation and complete missions to earn money. With that, you can improve your car or acquire new vehicles and garages.

Inspired by Brazilian settings, the game offers a rich atmosphere that includes favelas and other iconic locations on a fictional island called Juiz de Santos, providing an engaging and immersive experience.

LAF / BDQ is a tribute to classic racing games, now with modernized graphics and updated gameplay. It’s a game made to captivate both racing enthusiasts and car customization fans alike.

What’s Available in the Demo?

In the demo, you can:

  • Explore a portion of the map.

  • Participate in 13 races, divided into:

    • 3 Drift races (score-based);

    • 3 Circuit races;

    • 4 Sprint races; - One is secret.

    • 3 Time Attack races.

  • Play with 3 cars (2 of them must be purchased in the shop).

  • Buy a property.

  • Visit 3 available shops:

    • Workshop, paint shop, and sound system shop, plus the dealership and Betran (vehicle registration).

Demo Limitations:

  • Not all customization parts are available.

  • Only 4 weather types are available (day and night included).

  • Some phone features are disabled.

  • The game's initial progression is absent.

  • Not all songs are available.

  • Some activities from the full game are not present in the demo.

  • Removed some things from the Scenario

  • And more...

Demo Highlights

  • You can freely change the weather, as the photo mode is still under development. Try out different weather conditions and times of day to see how they transform the environment!

  • There’s a hidden exploit in the demo that might allow you to go beyond its limits. Can you find it? And what might you discover by doing so? 👀

Important Notice

The demo content does not represent the final version of the game. Features may be added, removed, or changed before release. Additionally, game progress made in the demo will not carry over to the final version.

What’s the Purpose of the Demo?

The demo was developed so players can test the game, report issues, and provide feedback on their experience. We want to hear your thoughts to make the game even better!

This is an independent project, developed by a small team of just 2 people (recently expanded to 4), with the goal of delivering a unique and fun game.

We hope you enjoy exploring Low and Furious / Baixos de Quebrada and help us make it even better!

Notice for Content Creators 🎥🎶

Content creators are free to play all the music in the game during gameplay, as they are original and AI-generated. 🚗💨🎵

⚠️ Attention: The only exception is the track by artist flávio duin. Please avoid playing this track during gameplay, as it may cause copyright issues.

Feel free to record and share your Low and Furious / Baixos de Quebrada gameplay! 🏁🔥
